meanings.definition: A member of a group of ancient peoples in Europe.
meanings.sent1: The Celts were known for their unique culture and traditions.
meanings.sent2: Many historians study the Celts to learn about ancient European civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The Celts must have had interesting stories to tell around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: In some ways, the Celts were like the original hipsters of Europe.
meanings.sent5: The image of the Celts wearing intricate jewelry and colorful clothing is fascinating.

meanings.definition: A prehistoric stone or metal tool.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered ancient celts used by early humans.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of celts found in the nearby caves.
meanings.sent3: Imagine trying to chop down a tree with a celt instead of an axe!
meanings.sent4: The celt gleamed in the sunlight, revealing its age and craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The celt was a crucial tool for survival in prehistoric times.
